attributes.action: A Vote in NO Confidence with the Tory Party & A Urgent Fairer Re Election
attributes.additional_details:
The WRAG in Employment and Support Allowance treats the people who can't work very well harder by decreasing there weekly Entitlement, 

People who already have low incomes are being made to suffer because of the Tax credits decrease.

The bedroom tax is unfair due to people who are disabled and need that extra room for their equipment. 

The Voting system isn't Fair, We need another Election ASAP with a fair voting system. 
A voting system where the Whole of the UK can vote for ANY PARTY!
attributes.background:
The Tories want to make Life harder for the poor and easier for the Rich,

Some of the Budget by George Osbourne really excludes 18-21 year olds, for example of the housing benefit, What about the 16-21 year olds who have had serious things happen and need support! That support has now gone

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think these petitions are similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104544
and
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104416

You might like to sign these petitions instead. They are more likely to get more signatures that way.
